Sunflower Art Installation: Create a large-scale installation of sunflowers made from recycled materials, such as plastic bottles, cans, and other recyclables. The installation will be designed to resemble a field of sunflowers, with each flower made from a different type of recycled material. The installation will be displayed in a public space, such as a park or plaza, and will serve as a reminder of the beauty of nature and the importance of recycling.

Sunflower-Inspired Fashion: Design a clothing line inspired by the sunflower, with pieces that incorporate elements of the flower's shape, color, and texture. The line will include dresses, tops, pants, and accessories, and will be made from sustainable materials, such as organic cotton, hemp, and recycled polyester. The clothing will be displayed in a fashion show, with models posing among life-size cutouts of sunflowers, creating a dramatic and eye-catching effect.

Sunflower-Themed Board Game: Create a board game inspired by the sunflower, with players taking on the role of sunflowers competing to reach the sun. The game will feature different challenges and obstacles, such as pests, diseases, and weather conditions, that players must overcome to reach the sun. The game will be designed for 2-4 players and will include a variety of game pieces, such as sunflower seeds, bees, and birds, that will help players progress through the game.

Sunflower-Inspired Home Decor: Design a line of home decor items, such as vases, candles, and wall art, inspired by the sunflower. Each item will feature intricate details and patterns inspired by the flower's petals and center, and will be made from high-quality materials, such as ceramic, glass, and wood. The items will be displayed in a home decor store, with the goal of creating a warm and inviting atmosphere that evokes the feeling of a sunflower field.
